DOC.brief_summary: This is a structured web-based survey in selected hospitals with intensive care units in Berlin- Brandenburg that will focus on the analysis of current knowledge in ICUs in the field of invasive mycoses.
DOC.brief_title: Perception and Prevalence of Fungal Infections in Berlin - Brandenburg
DOC.detailed_description: Intensive care patients with invasive mycosis require a special clinical expertise especially in light of a high lethality. Early identification of patients at risk to develop a fungal infection is of utmost importance to start effective antifungal therapy. The implementation of current knowledge into clinical practice to fight fungal infection is not clear.
DOC.criteria: Intensive care units of hospitals in the INABBRA alliance. Patients with invasive mycosis. Hospitals without intensive care unit.
